channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Link to Windows Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Link to Windows Service

item.title: CVE-2022-28790|2024-08-03T06:03:52.724Z -- samsung%20mobile -- link%20to%20windows%20service
item.description: Improper authentication in Link to Windows Service prior to version 2.3.04.1 allows attacker to lock the device. The patch adds proper caller signature check logic.
